scripts.start:db: docker run --rm -p 27017:27017 --name rankr-db --volume rankr-db:/data/db mongo:4.0.10 > '/dev/null' || docker stop rankr-db || true
scripts.build: npm run build-ts && npm run lint
scripts.watch: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Mongo,TypeScript,Node" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold" "npm run start:db" "npm run watch-ts" "npm run watch-node"
scripts.debug: npm run build && npm run watch-debug
scripts.watch-debug: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "TypeScript,Node" -c "cyan.bold,green.bold" "npm run watch-ts" yarn run serve-debug"
